this_title: The War of the World: A New History of the 20th Century
trans_title: 世界的战争:20世纪的新历史
introduction: 哈福大学历史学家Niall Ferguson，以自己的同名畅销书为原型，为PBS.org拍摄了3集纪录片。他试图以一种全新的看法来挑战现在被公众普遍认同的20世纪第二次世界大战的观点。Harvard historian Niall Ferguson presents an explosive challenge to common assumptions about the 20th century. In this extraordinarily written and stunningly filmed series, Ferguson challenges nearly all our enduring assumptions about World War II which was, without question, the most destructive conflict the planet has ever seen.
